properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Matagorda Bay; Galveston Bay
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 5:34PM CST until January 16 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to one quarter mile or
less.

* WHERE...Matagorda Bay, Galveston Bay and Coastal waters from
Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog over the Gulf waters will slowly
expand into the lower portions of the Bays and Intercoastal
waterway this evening.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THURSDAY
